name: quickmenu
description: The new era of mobile navigation for the web, we're out of hamburgers.

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/ -o dist/css/
scripts.css-compile-minify: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true src/scss/quickmenu.scss dist/css/quickmenu.min.css

author: Arif Ullah
